page.title: 19Pets,Fearn.
page.content: We did a small survey with Primaries 4,5,6,and 7.There were nine animals in our survey list,these being dogs, cats,rabbits,guinea pigs,hamsters fish,mice,birds and horses.The most popular group was mice because people said they had them behind their skirting boards!The smallest number was for hamsters.There was only one of them and that belonged to Iain Poe.He calls his pet Tickie.It is a multi-coloured hamster and sleeps all day.It eats bits of dried fruit, lettuce,biscuits,bits of Mars Bars and,if he gets the chance,Iain's fingers!It has a yellow wheel which it sometimes plays in.Iain also had the most pets-20 in total.He has one dog,one hamster,ten birds and the mice! This work has been compiled by pupils of Hill of Fearn Primary School.
